metadata.title: CVE-2015-8786 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible
metadata.description:
The Management plugin in RabbitMQ before 3.6.1 allows remote authenticatedusers with certain privileges to cause a denial of service (resourceconsumption) via the (1) lengths_age or (2) lengths_incr parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rabbitmq-server - 3.6.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.6-1').
